attributes.action: This is not fair for hospitality businesses in Kent area
attributes.additional_details: In Kent area  apart  from the isle of sheppey cases are below average. Government can reconsider their tier system decision in local Kent area
attributes.background: Reconsider tier system in Kent area and block the sheppey crossing. Because the most Cases are in isle of sheppey . It might stop spreading the virus .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562004

We also couldn't publish a petition that contained false or unproven statements about Covid-19 infection rates. There are several parts of Kent that have higher than average Covid-19 infection rates, and it is not true to say that most cases of Covid-19 are on the Isle of Sheppey.
